name: Your Present Guess (Minigame 8)
description:
Minigame 8 | 2020-12-18

  • Made during a 3-hour Friday morning stream (follow me on Twitch to catch my next minigame stream).
  • Written in JavaScript and C99 compiled to WASM (learn how you can do this with a simplified example here).
  • Keyboard, touch, and gamepad support.

Play on joshpowlison.com/minigames and log in with your Twitch account to compete for high scores and use your avatar from my channel!

All I can say about the state of this minigame is, I'm sorry.

I got distracted talking with chat for the 1st hour. Which was great, but I've started figuring out better processes to both talk with viewers and keep working on the game. It's an area I'm wanting to get better in.

A bit ironically, we had a great conversation on replayability on the stream where I made my least replayable game.

And yes, you literally do just press left and right and hope that you're correct, with no way to tell which answer is correct beforehand.
